name: 222 Hearts
description: ‘222 Hearts’ is an action platformer that utilizes the dash skill.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or later Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card with shader model 2.0 support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card Additional Notes: The game is recommended to play with keyboard&mouse.
